Emeka Ifejiagwa (à mụrụ ya na 30 Ọktoba 1977) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Naịjirịa lara ezumike nka

Ifejiagwa gbara Udoji United, Iwuanyanwo Nationale na Bendel Insurance na Nigeria, maka Charlton Athletic na Brighton & Hove Albion na England, maka CA Osasuna na Spain, na VfL Wolfsburg na Waldhof Mannheim na Germany.
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká dị ka n'ihi mmerụ ahụ, Ifejiagwa malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka mgbasa ozi n'ụlọ ọrụ Globalsports na Barcelona, Spain.
